name: Never.
description:
Made for Geta Game Jam 10 with the Godot Game Engine

You are trapped in an infinity logo and have to shoot enemys and survive.

By shooting Enemy bullets you can destroy them.

You can slow down time with the left mouse button, but only if you still have energy.

The Energy bar is the color of the player. Blue --> Full Energy. White --> No Energy

Music was taken from:

https://soundimage.org/looping-music/
